title: Interlinx B2B Portal

overview.description: A platform to manage B2B interactions and meetings for large events
overview.details: Enhanced the Interlinx B2B Portal to accommodate 5,000+ users, offering features like intelligent table allocation based on sector preferences and dynamic booking for meetings and presentations. Integrated payment gateways support seamless transactions for different user types. The admin panel enables efficient management of registrations, table occupancy tracking, and report generation.

features: Dynamic table allocation based on user preferences and availability
Advanced booking system for meetings and presentations
Integrated payment gateways for seamless transactions
Intuitive admin panel for managing registrations and tracking table occupancy
Real-time booking status and availability updates
Email and SMS notifications for booking confirmations and reminders
Scalable to support 5,000+ users for large-scale events
